ModMetaData.name: FTL Scenario - Kestrel C
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
Also called "The Swallow", that vessel crew is composed of 2 humans and 1 lanius.
This model was modified by pirates to utilize newly discovered technology. It can clone lost crewmembers and stun enemies. Unfortunately, It's crashed right now.
In this scenario inspired by Faster than Light, you will start with : - 1 cloning bay (1 phenodrill, 1 clone vat, 3 meat grinders) - 1 chemfuel power generator, 2 batteries - 30 industrial components - 1 basic rifle, 1 revolver, 1 wooden spear, 1 EMP grenade - 1 cat
In the surroundings are scattered : - 500 Chemfuel - 500 Steel
You will start with no technology, but your guys used to be in a spaceship, they cant be dumb. They hope to escape this planet. Is there still time for them to traverse the sectors of space to reach the Federation Fleet, and warn them of the incoming rebel threat ? Surviving looks more essential for now.
